entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
